lead_paragraph: American officials cite blocked websites and other limits on information as bad for foreign companies doing business in the vast market.

byline.contributor: Cao Li contributed research from Beijing.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Adds China’s Internet Controls to List of Trade Barriers
headline.main: U.S. Adds China’s Internet Controls to List of Trade Barriers

snippet: American officials cite blocked websites and other limits on information as bad for foreign companies doing business in the vast market.
abstract: United States trade officials, for first time, add China's Great Firewall network of Internet filters and blocks to annual list of trade barriers; action is unlikely to result in immediate ramifications but experts say it underscores American government's heightened worries over Internet regulation by China and impact it can have on foreign suppliers.
